blueprint_book.label: Brian's City (v4.0.1)
blueprint_book.description:
Self-Building Mega-Base
https://factorioprints.com/view/-MNZWdWosuqr3vtaC2hD

4.0.1:
* Fixed light-oil pipe in Blue Mall.
* Moved combinator in Strong Defense that (sometimes) conflicts with rail.
* Prevented signals wires in Strong Defense from connecting between segments.

Completely compatible with SBF v3.X; will just have an extra signal along some edges.
